error.message: Unable to update database to match the current model because there are pending changes and automatic migration is disabled. Either write the pending model changes to a code-based migration or enable automatic migration. Set DbMigrationsConfiguration.AutomaticMigrationsEnabled to true to enable automatic migration.
error.detail:
System.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred when trying to create a controller of type 'AHC.CD.WebUI.MVC.Controllers.TaskTrackerController'. Make sure that the controller has a parameterless public constructor. ---> Microsoft.Practices.Unity.ResolutionFailedException: Resolution of the dependency failed, type = "AHC.CD.WebUI.MVC.Controllers.TaskTrackerController", name = "(none)". Exception occurred while: Calling constructor AHC.CD.Business.TaskTracker.TaskTrackerManager(AHC.CD.Data.Repository.IUnitOfWork uow). Exception is: AutomaticMigrationsDisabledException - Unable to update database to match the current model because there are pending changes and automatic migration is disabled. Either write the pending model changes to a code-based migration or enable automatic migration. Set DbMigrationsConfiguration.AutomaticMigrationsEnabled to true to enable automatic migration. ----------------------------------------------- At the time of the exception, the container was:
